Tami


>From: Helen Hegener <HEM-Editor@...>

>
>At 8:44 AM +0000 4/2/01, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com wrote:
> >Message: 17
> > Date: Sun, 01 Apr 2001 23:49:07 -0400
> > From: "Tami Labig-Duquette" <labigduquette@...>
> >Subject: Re: Home Education Magazine
> >
> >
> >LOL, I was wondering about the bum thing, we think they are hind
>quarters,
> >and was wondering about the article :)
> >Tami
>
>LOL, Tami! No, in this case it's referring to lazy, shiftless people...
>
>It's Jeff Kelety's column, one of my favorites. A short excerpt:
>
>...my kids must look for all the world like a small band of young
>waifs idly tossing stones into the ocean. They must seem the
>quintessential artful dodgers, evading the truant officer by skillful
>means acquired in the course of endless days of unchaperoned street
>life. Loafers they must seem of the highest order; bums by any other
>name.
>
>Several of Jeff's older columns can be found at our website's archives.
>
>Helen
>

messages.subject: Bums
messages.msgSnippet: ... LOL, Tami! No, in this case it s referring to lazy, shiftless people... It s Jeff Kelety s column, one of my favorites. A short excerpt: ...my kids must
messages.messageBody:
At 8:44 AM +0000 4/2/01, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com wrote:
>Message: 17
> Date: Sun, 01 Apr 2001 23:49:07 -0400
> From: "Tami Labig-Duquette" <labigduquette@...>
>Subject: Re: Home Education Magazine
>
>
>LOL, I was wondering about the bum thing, we think they are hind quarters,
>and was wondering about the article :)
>Tami

LOL, Tami! No, in this case it's referring to lazy, shiftless people...

It's Jeff Kelety's column, one of my favorites. A short excerpt:

...my kids must look for all the world like a small band of young
waifs idly tossing stones into the ocean. They must seem the
quintessential artful dodgers, evading the truant officer by skillful
means acquired in the course of endless days of unchaperoned street
life. Loafers they must seem of the highest order; bums by any other
name.

Several of Jeff's older columns can be found at our website's archives.

Helen
